page.title: 06CROPS
page.content:
In Forden the main crop is silage. Hay is made by small farmers now. Hay is made from grass grown tall, cut and left for a few days and then turned upside down continuously and dried in the sun, so it won't rot or go mouldy.
The bailer comes round picking up the hay and putting it on a conveyer belt and moulding it into an oblong shape. Then it drops the bail of hay onto the ground. It is collected on to the trailer and is put in a shed. Then it is fed to the cows and other farm animals in the winter.
